question: On Monday, Lily wants to exercise for four times the amount of time he did on Sunday and Saturday combined. On Saturday he exercised for 14 minutes. On Sunday he exercised for 49 minutes. How many minutes does he have to exercise on Monday to reach his goal?
answer:
On Saturday and Sunday he exercised a total of 63 minutes because 14 + 49 = <<14+49=63>>63
On Monday he has to exercise for 252 minutes because 63*4 = <<63*4=252>>252
#### 252
